mapper.select: SELECT 1 AS LEVEL, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef FROM board_category WHERE cateCodeRef IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS LEVEL, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef FROM board_category WHERE cateCodeRef IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cateCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (brdNum, brdName, cateCode, brdLink, brdDes1, brdDes2, brdImg, brdThumb) VALUES ((select max(brdNum)+1 from board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY), #{brdName}, #{cateCode}, #{brdLink}, #{brdDes1}, #{brdDes2}, #{brdImg}, #{brdThumb})
mapper.select: SELECT bd.brdNum, bd.brdName, bd.brdLink, bd.brdDes1, bd.brdDes2, bd.brdDate, bd.cateCode , bc.cateName, bc.cateCodeRef, bd.brdImg, bd.brdThumb FROM board bd INNER JOIN board_category bc ON bd.cateCode = bc.cateCode

SELECT bd.brdNum, bd.brdName, bd.brdLink, bd.brdDes1, bd.brdDes2, bd.brdDate, bd.cateCode , bc.cateName, bc.cateCodeRef, bd.brdImg, bd.brdThumb FROM board bd INNER JOIN board_category bc ON bd.cateCode = bc.cateCode WHERE bd.brdNum = #{brdNum}
